original_title: Vérité de la démocratie, Jean-Luc Nancy (1,2,3)
overview: In 2009, Klotz and Perceval visit Jean-Luc Nancy at his home in Strasbourg, where they record a conversation in three intervals, in which the zenith of political discourse blends with everyday life. A lesson that is reflected in the communities at the center of both author’s films.
title: Vérité de la démocratie, Jean-Luc Nancy (1,2,3)
